Html:
I tried to modify the source of version 2.1 and when i compile it didn't work :
It is mentioned in the home page that framework 2.0 should be used.

I've got visual studio 10 on seven with framework 3.5 and 4.0

I tried to modify Excel\Build.Debug.CF.bat to access the correct csc compiler and the required assembly needed :

so i set:
SET CSC=C:\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v2.0.50727\csc.exe /nologo
and i set also:
set NETCF_PATH=C:\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v2.0.50727

i had also to create the missing sub-directory and file:
Binaries\netcf-20\ICSharpCode.SharpZipLib.dll

But the compilation failed with those errors:
ExcelDataReader.cs(152,45): error CS0117: 'Excel.Core.BinaryFormat.XlsWorksheet'
    ne contient pas de définition pour 'Data'
ExcelDataReader.cs(306,10): error CS0117: 'Excel.Core.BinaryFormat.XlsWorksheet'
    ne contient pas de définition pour 'Data'
It seems "Data" member doesn't exist in Excel.Core.BinaryFormat.XlsWorksheet' class

Can you confirm me that I must use Framework 2.0 to compile v2.1 version (82323) ?
Can you confirm me that I must use Framework 2.0 to compile v2.0.1 version (27264) ?

Thanks in advance
Best regards
P. Gineste

You don't need 2.0 to compile.

I quite happily use 4.0

Thank you very much.
I succeeded to compile
